data.message: Ive sent 3 messages to facebook and no response. Getting notifications from people that are NOT on my friends list. Cant delete cause there is no little arrow on the right side. They are annoying. How do i report?

replies.message: Hi Annie. You can't turn off notifications entirely, but you can adjust what you're notified about. Learn more at: http://on.fb.me/1qJujYU  - Elissa
Ive sent 3 messages to facebook and no response. Getting notifications from people that are NOT on my friends list. Cant delete cause there is no little arrow on the right side. They are
Yea.... this is a peeve of mine too facebook.

Timeline filled with updates from many people I don't know.. and few from people I do know... not as much fun as it used to be for sure... the good news is I stay on it less and am more productive otherwise....
